channel.title: Notebook on LRG
channel.description: Recent content in Notebook on LRG

item.title: Default
item.description:
This layout style is inspired by really early penguin classics. It accepts all the theme colours, but doesn’t have a place to display an image.

If the author is not defined, the layout will display the official Chicken logo.

item.title: Vintage
item.description:
style: layout-vintage

Can take quite long headlines, and other text elements. Simple .svg images work really well - especially things like clip art or cartoonos, but bitmap images don’t really fit the style very well, and may look squashed if they’re not square to match the available space.

The author attribute will not show
